official-title.#text: To provide for the relief of Lori L. Rogers.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: shall pay to Lori L. Rogers of West Jordan, Utah, $1,132.32 as reimbursement for the evacuation travel and transportation expenses incurred by Lori L. Rogers in good faith reliance on erroneous information contained in verbal and written orders to evacuate from Egypt that the United States would pay such expenses incident to her evacuation.

text.#text: Out of any money in the Treasury not otherwise appropriated, the
